data.event: Most pomelo farms harvest twice a year in conjunction with Chinese New Year and Mid Autumn Festival.

event.title: years of the 20th century and the emergency period after the Second World War, most Tambun planters also increased

data.event: In the early years of the 20th century and the emergency period after the Second World War, most Tambun planters also increased yield by rearing pigs and chickens within their pomelo farms.

event.title: continued until the turn of the century

data.event: This practiced continued until the turn of the century when Japanese Encephalitis struck the district.
